title: This workshop was something I have never experienced before and it was amazing.
content: I have never so closely taught kids art. I noticed that even though kids had never been exposed to such activity before, they were very passionate about it. This experience has motivated me to promote more and more art to the kids or anyone for that matter who has never been exposed to art and the joy it gives.
author: Fariya Maryam

title: Working with the people in Ayka helped me explore the gateway to happiness of young children.
content: It was an opportunity that made me question everything I stand for and taught to me empathize and enjoy the smallest of things bringing the biggest of smiles. It was an experience I will be forever grateful for.
author: Ishika Midha
